title: Structural, optical and magnetic properties of a new metal–organic CoII-based complex
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25048-25061
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02149E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wiem Jabeur, Marcus Korb, Mohamed Hamdi, Mariia Holub, Dávid Princík, Vladimír Zeleňák, Antonio Sanchez-Coronilla, Marwan Shalash, Erik Čižmár, Houcine Naïli
A new semiconducting compound [C5H8N3]2[CoCl4(C5H7N3)2] displays HF and LF relaxation channels, characterized by under-barrier and direct relaxation processes, respectively, as revealed by ab initio calculations and magnetic data analysis.
